name: Python
description: Learn Python from installation to real-world projects with practical, beginner-friendly tutorials.
tagline: From zero to Python developer with hands-on examples.

tutorials.title: 1. Step-by-Step Guide: Installing and Running Python Scripts on Windows
tutorials.description: Install Python on Windows, set up your environment, and run your first Python scripts from VS Code and the terminal.

tutorials.title: 2. Python Variables and Data Types for Beginners
tutorials.description: Learn what variables are in Python and how to use integers, floats, strings, booleans, lists, tuples, and dictionaries with simple, practical examples.

tutorials.title: 3. Python Control Structures: Conditionals and Loops
tutorials.description: Understand how to control the flow of your programs using if/elif/else, for loops, and while loops. Learn how to build decision-making logic and repeat tasks efficiently.

tutorials.title: 4. Neetechs Python Tutorial: Functions, Modules, and Classes with Animal Examples
tutorials.description: Learn how to write reusable functions, organize code into modules, and define classes using fun animal-based examples. Great for visual and younger learners.

tutorials.title: 5. Top 25 Essential Python Libraries for Every Developer
tutorials.description: Explore 25 must-know Python libraries for data analysis, web development, automation, and machine learning, with clear explanations and practical examples.

tutorials.title: Python for Data Science
tutorials.description: Explore how to use Python for data analysis, cleaning, and visualization with popular data science tools.

tutorials.title: Web Development with Python
tutorials.description: Learn how to build web applications using Python frameworks such as Django or FastAPI, including routing, views, and basic deployment concepts.

tutorials.title: Automating Tasks with Python
tutorials.description: Discover how to automate repetitive tasks such as file handling, web scraping, and simple system jobs using Python scripts.

tutorials.title: Python Project: Download Any File from a URL (with Progress Bar)
tutorials.description: Build a Python script that downloads any file from a direct URL using streaming, progress bars, and safe error handling. Great practice for HTTP requests, file I/O, and CLI tools.

tutorials.title: Solana Keypair Generator
tutorials.description: Learn how to generate Solana keypairs and derive public keys from seed phrases using Python cryptography libraries.

tutorials.title: Ethereum Keypair Generator
tutorials.description: Learn how to generate Ethereum keypairs and derive public keys from mnemonic phrases using Python and web3 tools.
